title: Okra and Tomato
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', 'handful chopped fresh parsley', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '500g (1 1/4 lb) okra, trimmed and sliced']
